Description: Stamp (vessel): half-qisṭ. Measure of olive-oil. Five line Kufic inscription. Made of green glass. Chipped at top.
Curator's comments: On this die, exceptionally under Ḥayyān, the otherwise standard form wāf is used instead of wāfī. See OA+ 4334.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (20)
Associated names: Named in inscription: Ḥayyān b. Shurayḥ
